    Class
    Description
    class 
    AlfrescoNodeProcessorApplicationRunner
    Runs the application from the command line.
    class 
    AlfrescoNodeProcessorConfiguration
    Spring configuration that defines common beans used by the application such as the queue and the lists of asynchronous tasks.

  • Uses of BaseComponent in org.saidone.collectors

    Subclasses of BaseComponent in org.saidone.collectors
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractNodeCollector
    Base implementation of NodeCollector providing queue injection and a default asynchronous execution of NodeCollector.collectNodes(CollectorConfig).
    class 
    NodeListCollector
    Collects node identifiers from a text file where each line contains a node id.
    class 
    NodeTreeCollector
    Walks a node tree starting from a given root node or path and collects the identifiers of all descendant nodes.
    class 
    QueryNodeCollector
    Executes an Alfresco FTS query and enqueues the resulting node identifiers.

  • Uses of BaseComponent in org.saidone.processors

    Subclasses of BaseComponent in org.saidone.processors
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractNodeProcessor
    Base implementation of NodeProcessor that pulls node identifiers from the shared queue and delegates work to NodeProcessor.processNode(String, ProcessorConfig).
    class 
    AddAspectsAndSetPropertiesProcessor
    Adds configured aspects and properties to each processed node.
    class 
    ChainingNodeProcessor
    A processor that delegates node processing to a chain of other processors.
    class 
    DeleteNodeProcessor
    Deletes each node passed to the processor.
    class 
    DownloadNodeProcessor
    Downloads content and metadata of a node to the local filesystem.
    class 
    LogNodeNameProcessor
    Logs the name of each processed node.
    class 
    MoveNodeProcessor
    Moves nodes to the configured target parent node.
    class 
    NormalizeMetadataProcessor
    Metadata normalization processor.
    class 
    SetPermissionsProcessor
    Applies permission settings to each processed node.
    class 
    VoidProcessor
    No-op processor used as placeholder.

    Class
    Description
    class 
    LockService
    Ensures that only one instance of the application runs at a time.
